content: Thomas was an atheist. Now he is studying biochemistry and has become convinced that something like DNA and RNA molecules cannot be the product of natural laws and forces generated by the Big Bang.
translations: ita:Tommaso era ateo. Ora sta studiando biochimica e si Ã¨ convinto che qualcosa come le molecole di DNA e RNA non possono es
